description: Police are called to the prison following reports of violence between two inmates.
title: Attempted murder arrest following Peterborough prison attack
title_page: Attempted murder arrest following Peterborough prison attack - BBC News
maintext:
A 21-year-old man has been arrested on suspicion of attempted murder following violence at a city prison.
Cambridgeshire Police officers were called to HMP Peterborough at 08:45 GMT on Thursday.
A prison spokesperson said an incident had occurred between two prisoners, resulting in one being taken to hospital. Police said the injuries were potentially life-threatening.
The arrested man remains in custody at the city's Thorpe Wood Police Station.
